info.title: RAGLOX
info.description: Red Team Automation Platform with Blackboard Architecture

get.description: List all active mission IDs.

schema.title: Response List Missions Api V1 Missions Get

post.description:
Create a new mission.

- **name**: Mission name
- **description**: Optional description
- **scope**: List of target ranges (CIDRs, IPs, domains)
- **goals**: List of objectives (e.g., ["domain_admin", "data_exfil"])
- **constraints**: Optional constraints (e.g., {"stealth": true})

get.description: Get mission status and details.
List all targets for a mission.

schema.title: Response List Targets Api V1 Missions  Mission Id  Targets Get

get.description: Get a specific target.
List all vulnerabilities for a mission.

schema.title: Response List Vulnerabilities Api V1 Missions  Mission Id  Vulnerabilities Get

get.description: List all credentials for a mission.

schema.title: Response List Credentials Api V1 Missions  Mission Id  Credentials Get

get.description: List all active sessions for a mission.

schema.title: Response List Sessions Api V1 Missions  Mission Id  Sessions Get

get.description: Get mission statistics.

schema.title: Response Get Mission Stats Api V1 Missions  Mission Id  Stats Get

get.description:
List all pending approval requests for a mission.

These are high-risk actions waiting for user consent.

schema.title: Response List Pending Approvals Api V1 Missions  Mission Id  Approvals Get

post.description:
Approve a pending action.

This allows the action to proceed and resumes mission execution.

- **action_id**: ID of the action to approve
- **user_comment**: Optional comment explaining the approval

Reject a pending action.

The system will attempt to find an alternative approach.

- **action_id**: ID of the action to reject
- **rejection_reason**: Reason for rejection
- **user_comment**: Optional additional comment

Send a chat message to interact with the mission.

This allows users to:
- Ask about mission status
- Give instructions (pause, resume)
- Query pending approvals

- **content**: Message content
- **related_task_id**: Optional related task
- **related_action_id**: Optional related approval action

get.description:
Get chat history for a mission.

- **limit**: Maximum number of messages to return (default 50)

schema.title: Response Get Chat History Api V1 Missions  Mission Id  Chat Get

get.description:
Get knowledge base statistics.

Returns overview of the loaded knowledge including:
- Total techniques, tactics, and RX modules
- Supported platforms
- Distribution by platform and executor type

List all techniques with optional filtering.

- **platform**: Filter by platform (windows, linux, macos, etc.)
- **limit**: Maximum items to return
- **offset**: Pagination offset

Get a specific technique by ID.

- **technique_id**: MITRE ATT&CK technique ID (e.g., T1003, T1003.001)

Get all RX modules for a technique.

- **technique_id**: Technique ID
- **platform**: Optional platform filter

schema.title: Response Get Technique Modules Api V1 Knowledge Techniques  Technique Id  Modules Get

get.description:
List RX modules with filtering and pagination.

- **technique_id**: Filter by technique
- **platform**: Filter by platform (windows, linux, macos)
- **executor_type**: Filter by executor type (powershell, sh, cmd)
- **limit**: Maximum items to return
- **offset**: Pagination offset

Get a specific RX module by ID.

- **module_id**: RX Module ID (e.g., rx-t1003-001)

List all MITRE ATT&CK tactics.

Returns all tactics with their technique counts.

schema.title: Response List Tactics Api V1 Knowledge Tactics Get

get.description:
Get all techniques for a tactic.

- **tactic_id**: MITRE ATT&CK tactic ID (e.g., TA0001)

schema.title: Response Get Tactic Techniques Api V1 Knowledge Tactics  Tactic Id  Techniques Get

get.description:
List all supported platforms.

Returns list of platform names that have RX modules.

schema.title: Response List Platforms Api V1 Knowledge Platforms Get

get.description:
Get RX modules for a specific platform.

- **platform**: Platform name (windows, linux, macos, etc.)
- **limit**: Maximum items to return

schema.title: Response Get Platform Modules Api V1 Knowledge Platforms  Platform  Modules Get

get.description:
Search RX modules by keyword.

Searches in technique names, IDs, and descriptions.

- **q**: Search query
- **platform**: Optional platform filter
- **tactic**: Optional tactic filter
- **limit**: Maximum results

schema.title: Response Search Modules Api V1 Knowledge Search Get

post.description:
Search RX modules by keyword (POST variant).

Use this for complex searches with multiple filters.

schema.title: Response Search Modules Post Api V1 Knowledge Search Post

post.description:
Get the best matching module for a task.

Uses intelligent scoring to select the most appropriate module
based on tactic, technique, platform, and other criteria.

- **tactic**: Target tactic
- **technique**: Target technique
- **platform**: Target platform
- **executor_type**: Preferred executor type
- **require_elevation**: Whether elevation is required

schema.title: Response Get Best Module For Task Api V1 Knowledge Best Module Post

get.description:
Get modules suitable for exploitation.

Maps common vulnerabilities to exploit modules.

- **vuln_type**: CVE ID or vulnerability name (e.g., MS17-010, EternalBlue)
- **platform**: Target platform

schema.title: Response Get Exploit Modules Api V1 Knowledge Exploit Modules Get

get.description:
Get modules suitable for reconnaissance.

Returns modules for system discovery, network enumeration, etc.

- **platform**: Target platform

schema.title: Response Get Recon Modules Api V1 Knowledge Recon Modules Get

get.description:
Get modules for credential harvesting.

Returns modules for dumping credentials, accessing password stores, etc.

- **platform**: Target platform

schema.title: Response Get Credential Modules Api V1 Knowledge Credential Modules Get

get.description:
Get modules for privilege escalation.

Returns modules for elevating privileges on compromised systems.

- **platform**: Target platform

schema.title: Response Get Privesc Modules Api V1 Knowledge Privesc Modules Get

get.description:
List Nuclei templates with filtering and pagination.

- **severity**: Filter by severity level
- **protocol**: Filter by protocol type
- **tag**: Filter by tag
- **limit**: Maximum items to return
- **offset**: Pagination offset

parameters.name: severity

schema.description: Filter by severity (critical, high, medium, low, info)
schema.title: Severity

parameters.description: Filter by severity (critical, high, medium, low, info)

parameters.name: protocol

schema.description: Filter by protocol (http, tcp, dns, ssl)
schema.title: Protocol

parameters.description: Filter by protocol (http, tcp, dns, ssl)

parameters.name: tag

schema.description: Filter by tag (rce, sqli, xss, cve)
schema.title: Tag

parameters.description: Filter by tag (rce, sqli, xss, cve)

get.description:
Get a specific Nuclei template by ID.

- **template_id**: Nuclei template ID (e.g., CVE-2021-44228)

Search Nuclei templates by keyword.

Searches in template IDs, names, CVE IDs, and tags.

- **q**: Search query
- **severity**: Optional severity filter
- **protocol**: Optional protocol filter
- **limit**: Maximum results

schema.title: Response Search Nuclei Templates Api V1 Knowledge Nuclei Search Get

get.description:
Get Nuclei template for a specific CVE.

- **cve_id**: CVE ID (e.g., CVE-2021-44228)

Get Nuclei templates by severity level.

- **severity**: Severity level (critical, high, medium, low, info)
- **limit**: Maximum results

schema.title: Response Get Nuclei Templates By Severity Api V1 Knowledge Nuclei Severity  Severity  Get

get.description:
Get critical severity Nuclei templates.

Shortcut for /nuclei/severity/critical.

schema.title: Response Get Critical Nuclei Templates Api V1 Knowledge Nuclei Critical Get

get.description:
Get Remote Code Execution (RCE) Nuclei templates.

Filters templates with 'rce' tag.

schema.title: Response Get Rce Nuclei Templates Api V1 Knowledge Nuclei Rce Get

get.description:
Get SQL Injection (SQLi) Nuclei templates.

Filters templates with 'sqli' tag.

schema.title: Response Get Sqli Nuclei Templates Api V1 Knowledge Nuclei Sqli Get

get.description:
Get Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Nuclei templates.

Filters templates with 'xss' tag.

schema.title: Response Get Xss Nuclei Templates Api V1 Knowledge Nuclei Xss Get

get.description: Root endpoint.
Health check endpoint.

MissionCreate.description: Model for creating a new mission.

TaskModuleRequest.description: Request for best module for a task.
